snippet.title: Keep Them Below - Playthrough (short horror/adventure)
snippet.description:
-- Keep Them Below - Playthrough (short horror/adventure) --
My wife playing Keep Them Below on  PC.
You never really knew your grandparents. Your parents refused to speak about them and any mention of them resulted in a cold silence. You learn that your grandparents have passed away. The strange thing is that they left you their farm. You travel to the farm to meet with a solicitor to sign the final legal papers but he did not show up. You decide to spend the night at the farm in hopes that he will arive the next day.

https://eyesodic-games.itch.io/keep-them-below
https://gamejolt.com/games/keep-them-below/101918

Published Oct 23, 2015
Status         Released
Platforms Windows
Author         Eyesodic Games
Genre         Adventure
Tags         First-Person, free, ghosts, Halloween, Horror, scary

-- Keep Them Below - Playthrough (short horror/adventure) --
